name: iPhone 15
description: Next-generation A-series processor for enhanced performance and efficiency, improved camera system for better low-light performance, and 5G connectivity enhancements.

name: iPhone 14
description: Features the A15 Bionic chip, Super Retina XDR display, and dual-camera system with advanced photography features like Photonic Engine for improved low-light performance.

name: iPhone 13
description: Powered by the A15 Bionic chip, features a Super Retina XDR display, and dual-camera system with Cinematic mode for depth-of-field transitions in video recording.

name: S24+ Smartphone
description: Features next-gen chipset, Dynamic AMOLED 2X display, triple rear camera setup with advanced AI features, and enhanced 5G connectivity.

name: Samsung S21 Ultra
description: Powered by Exynos 2100 or Snapdragon 888, features a Dynamic AMOLED 2X display, quad rear camera setup, and supports 8K video recording.

name: Samsung S20
description: Powered by Exynos 990 or Snapdragon 865, features a Dynamic AMOLED 2X display, triple rear camera setup, and 5G connectivity option.
